Notes

  1. Note that the postProcess search incorporates the user's selection as $$field$$ in a couple places. This is not possible using just Splunk's core modules.
  2. This is just a static Pulldown module. Things start to get really interesting when the pulldowns themselves are rendering options from the datacube search.
